Get font metrics for a string.

Source: R/str-metrics.R
str_metrics.Rd

Get font metrics for a string.

Usage

str_metrics(
  x,
  fontname = "sans",
  fontsize = 12,
  bold = FALSE,
  italic = FALSE,
  fontfile = ""
)

Arguments

x

Character vector of strings to measure

fontname

Font name

fontsize

Font size

bold, italic

Is text bold/italic?

fontfile

Font file

Value

A named numeric vector

Examples

str_metrics("Hello World!")
#>      width     ascent    descent 
#> 74.1328125  9.1171875  0.1699219
